description: A book of the critters and people you find!
name: Bestiary

description:
A weird glowing tomato... spoken of in only ancient 
times. Quite the relic!
name: Shiny Tomato

description:
A chunk of metal that came off of one of Scilio's 
Robo-Masters... likely some knobber wants it.
name: Master Scrap

description:
I ASSURE you that this is ABSOLUTELY necessary to 
break rocks in your path!
name: Pickaxe

description:
A nice utensil for digging holes. Or uh... for 
filling them.
name: Shovel

description:
A strange crystal that repels the darkness... one 
alone is pretty weak, however.
name: Crystal of Light

description: Restores HP by 500 points.
name: Biscuit

description:
Restores HP by 1500 points. Thick, viscuous, and... 
hardy.
name: Lava Cake

description: Completely restores HP. Who doesn't love macaroni?!
name: Hearty Mac

description: Restores MP by 200 points.
name: MP Caramel

description:
Raises the subject from the dead. 
(Restores HP by half.)
name: Revive Crystal

description:
Removes all status ailments.
(Cannot cure death or anxiety.)
name: Refreshing Herb

description: Cures poison, paralysis, leafification, and cold.
name: The Antidote

description: Restores HP and MP by half.
name: Miracle Drop

description: Restores 33% of your MP.
name: Elixir

description:
It's a tomato. Or is it tomato? I don't remember how 
it's pronounced.
name: Tomato

description: A nice big jug of water... restores 100 MP.
name: Water

description:
Halves the number of enemies you will encounter
for a while.
name: Putrid Scent

description:
Increases items and money gained from battle for 300
steps...
name: Double Cherry!

description: Yummy! Heals 1 HP.
name: Box of Apple Juice

description:
It's said this particular food product helped Jesus 
himself on his journey... tf you gonna do with it...?
name: Egg

description: Increases max HP by 50 points.
name: HP Increase

description: Increases max MP by 10 points.
name: MP Increase

description:
Increases Attack by 3 points. Why would you drink hot 
sauce, though...?
name: Lucifar's Hot Sauce

description: Increases Defense by 3 points. Def goes up...
name: Defup

description: Increases M.Attack by 3 points.
name: Magic Increase

description:
Increases M.Defense by 3 points. Named after 
Napolmeron. Really not a good name for it...
name: Napolm Sauce

description: Increases Agility by 3 points.
name: Illegal Sugar

description:
Increases Luck by 3 points! Apply directly to forehead! 
Headon, apply directly to forehead!
name: Headon

description:
A red hot key for the chest in the dungeon under 
Charles' house!
name: Fiery Key

description:
A pair of contact lens that were somehow dropped on 
the ground! How did you not crush them?
name: Contact Lens

description: Better hope you hit the enemy!
name: Throwing Axe

description:
A weirdly textured stone key for unlocking a door to 
the beach!
name: Beach Key

description: Restores HP by 800 points and gives 25 TP. Nice!
name: Ice Cream

description:
Don't be ridiculous, you can't revive someone from 
the dead with some ol' dog!
name: Hot Dog

description:
Restores everyone's HP by 600 points. Fun for the 
whole party!
name: Banana Split

description: Crispy and yummy! Restores 300 HP.
name: Toasted Marshmallow

description:
Energizing and hot! Restores MP by 150 points, and TP 
by 20 points.
name: Coffee

description:
Restores HP by 75% and increases speed, but makes the 
drinker enraged.
name: Soda Pop

description: A frozen, cold key for the gate to Maldred!
name: Maldred Key

description: A nice, crisp lab keycard to the big chamber.
name: High-Level Lab Keycard

description:
Residue from the liquid that mysterious creature was 
bathing in. You don't wanna think about it too much...
name: Mew Dust

description:
Your pass to the next challenge for completeing the 
Beginner Challenge of the Battle Tower!
name: Beginner Pass

description:
Your pass to the next challenge for completeing the 
Apprentice Challenge of the Battle Tower!
name: Apprentice Pass

description:
Your pass to the next challenge for completeing the 
Average Challenge of the Battle Tower!
name: Average Pass

description:
Your pass to the next challenge for completeing the 
Mild Challenge of the Battle Tower!
name: Mild Pass

description:
Your pass to the next challenge for completeing the 
Great Challenge of the Battle Tower!
name: Great Pass

description: Restores MP by 50%. Fizzler's favorite!
name: Cherry Pop

description: The whole fucking chest? Really?
name: Chest

description: A jar of milk... whatever will you do with it?
name: Milk

description: Leave him be.
name: Joseph

description: A screwdriver. Can probably be used for... something.
name: Screwdriver

description: Who would want this?? Eeeeyuck!
name: Ball of Goo

description:
A book of the critters and people you find! You uh, 
shouldn't have this version?
name: Old Bestiary

description:
An ancient scroll detailing a powerful fire-based 
move from eons ago...
name: Fire Scroll

description: Needed to enter Forsaken's throne room, obviously.
name: Forsaken Key

description:
Unconventional but necessary. 
Do not drink it.
name: Can of Fruit Juice

description:
The Mercile was locked off a while ago to keep in all
the yuckies within... let's go inside!
name: Mercile Key

description:
A chunk of metal that came off of one of Scilio's 
Robo-Masters... but cooler.
name: Super Master Scrap

description: Hardly does anything, but it sure hits the spot!
name: Can o' Beans...

description:
Restores everyone's HP by 900 points. No those aren't 
just fries.
name: Fish n' Chips

description:
Literally. Gives 50 TP! Not sure how it doesn't just 
fucking kill you.
name: Lightning in a Bottle

description:
It's... trash. You aren't actually going to consume 
it, are you?
name: Trash...

description:
Recovers 15% of your HP. Not much, but cheap and very 
scrumptiolicious!
name: Fruit Gummies

description: Glub glub.
name: Glub

description: Can I haz? It reztores 2000 HP...
name: Chezburger

description: Ah, so refreshing~! Restores 400 MP.
name: Bloxy Cola

description:
Restores 33% of HP and MP! The perfect brew for your 
designated team witch.
name: Witches Brew

description:
Everyone loves PIZZA!!! Restores 250 HP and raises 
ATK for 3 turns.
name: Pizza!

description:
Restores 20% HP and raises Max HP for 5 turns! 
FOR EVERYONE!!! YIPPEE!!!!!
name: Birthday Cake

description:
This... this is literally just a bowl of a sugary 
mineral- ah well, it gives you HP Regeneration.
name: Selperter Stew

description:
Fills you with enough energy to just run away no 
matter the opponent!
name: Escape Root

description: Fred's pages to collect...
name: Fred's Pages

description:
It sure is orb-like... really puts you in a calm 
state of mind! Gives a small recover to everyone...
name: Zarron's Orb

description:
A strange key... looks like it's for a big clocktower 
somewhere deep... hm!
name: Big Ben Key

description:
Raises speed for 5 turns! Good if you're feelin' 
creaky...
name: WD-40

description:
Semi-edible chips that deal 120 damage but up your 
defense for 6 turns!
name: Iron Chips

description:
An exploding rocket that, after exploding, blows out 
debris that does small damage to all enemies!
name: Bottle Rocket

description:
The poison. The poison for Kuzco. The poison chosen 
specifically to kill Kuzco. Not your poison.
name: The Poison

description: It's a strange, cross-shaped knick-knack.
name: Damn Doohickey

description: Ain't much on its own but it does heal 400 HP!
name: Nugget

description:
Because you couldn't combine them yourself. Too 
legendary... restores 1000 HP and boosts luck 3 turns.
name: Nugget in a Biscuit

description:
Banana split with a big ol' icecream crammed into it 
somehow made this masterpiece. 700 HP + 15 TP for all!
name: Mega Sundae Supreme!

description:
I guess... everything's.... a bit better with some 
TLC? Ew... this could either poison or give regen...
name: Trashburger

description:
Very convenient key for opening up the OTHER gate 
set up to block The Mercile...
name: Shortkey

description:
Nice pretty pink flower plucked off a bush... 
recovers 66% HP and recovers you from most states.
name: Pretty Flower

description:
If for whatever reason you want an area that CAN rain 
to rain... just use it, and next time you go out...
name: Raincall

description: A rope used to tie things together... but what?
name: David's Rope

description:
It looks like the head of a hammer... and it's heavy 
as hell!
name: David's Hammer Head

description:
It looks like an old flute that was patched up and 
fashioned into a handle of sorts.
name: David's Handle

description: He got it on sale for a few cents...
name: Arcade Key

description:
Your pass to the next challenge for completeing the 
Major Challenge of the Battle Tower!
name: Major Pass

description:
A yummalicious jar of honey! Removes poison and 
anxiety, and restores 1200 HP.
name: Honey

description:
Recovers all HP & MP and revives, amongst other buffs.
It's... so beautiful...
name: 15. Sauce

description:
Too hot to hold! Chance to hit anyone for 600 damage!
"Mmm, I think I'll add the potato."
name: Hot Potato

description:
Become big and strong! Heals 750, buffs ATK for 5 
turns, but lowers agility as well...
name: Mushroom

description: Enhance physical attacks with the force of fire!
name: Fire Flower

description:
Makes you grow bee wings and hover for 3 turns, 
preventing stunning and slipping! Also heals ~300...
name: Beeshroom

description: Makes you invincible for 3 turns.
name: Power Star

description:
Revives a teammate with 3/4 of their HP and has a 
chance of giving HP Regeneration after the fact.
name: 1-Up

description:
A banana! Or at least the peel of one. Slip up your 
foe! And do a small bit of embarassing damage...
name: Happy Bananer

description: Slips up EVERYONE. Wha-pow!
name: POW Block

description:
Throw at your foes to cause a fire-setting explosion 
on them all!
name: Boob-Omb

description:
A lil' lightning bolt friend! Shrinks all enemies, 
lowering their defense and attack and doing damage.
name: Lightning That You Can Hold Apparently

description:
Gushy lil' squid friend! Squirts ink at an enemy, 
lowering speed and accuracy.
name: Bloopy McSquidInk

description: Used to unlock a cell in the Rambitz Dungeon.
name: Cell Key

description: You shouldn't have this.
name: Dev Pass

description: Could sell for a decent amount... so shiny and pretty!
name: Diamond

description: A whimsical music box that drains the HP of all foes!
name: Music Box of Drainage

description:
A whimsical music box that may make your foes 
hesitate! It's a little borked...
name: Music Box of Hesitation

description:
A whimsical music box that reduces all foes attack 
for 3 turns.
name: Music Box of Relaxation

description:
To access Tristoville, the northwest village of The 
Mercile... and third village they've tried to set up?
name: Tristoville Key

description: 1 of 2 artifacts needed to proceed in a cave...
name: Cave Artifact

description: A key to Pokey's pen house...
name: Pen House Key

description:
A key to the... pool room? Does he even own the place? 
Or is this just for the convenience of the moment...
name: Pool Room Key

description:
+300 HP, all stats up for 3 turns, +5 TP, but get 
completely swarmed!
name: Royal Honeycomb

description: Your very own computer friend. He loves to chat!
name: Computer Friend!

description:
Lowers defense but raises attack for 4 turns. Heals 
345 HP. Pickles and cheese but no meat. What gives?
name: Kleos Sandwich

description:
Raises luck for 5 turns, +10 TP.
(Luck effects chances of being inflicted by statuses.)
name: Gummy Floppy

description:
How did we get here? 
JERIGOO 2 AT A THEATER NEAR YOU! Soon.
name: Jerigoo

description:
Your brain is getting a lil' funny feelin'... upgrades 
uh, something!
name: Funny Sauce
